posts.post_content:
All, 

I’m looking to complete my T206 Boston AL team set. In need of the following cards. If you have anything you’re willing to sell, please let me know:

Bill Carrigan: American Beauty or Cycle back
Harry Lord: American Beauty, Cycle, or EPDG back
Harry Niles: Sovereign Back
Jake Stahl (Glove): AB, Cycle, EPDG, or Piedmont 42 back

Thanks in advance.
